1: <pb/><e>Ayic sb'itan jun b'it tic vin̈ cuchb'um yic b'it, a yamc'ab' vajxaque' sch'an̈al sc'anchaji. Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, man̈ in a tumej yed' yoval a c'ool. Man̈ ac' in yaelal ayic scot oval d'ayin.</t>
2: <t>Mamin, oc'oc val a c'ool d'ayin, yujto man̈xalaj vip svab'i. Mamin, ac'xi b'ox in c'ool yujto a in nivanil tic sluclon yuj man̈ ipal.</t>
3: <t>Te somchajnac in c'ool. A achxo Mamin Jehová, ¿b'aq'uin̈ ol ach och ved'oc?</t>
4: <t>Mamin Jehová, ochan̈ val q'uelan d'ayin, colinel yed' val a nivan vach'c'olal.</t>
5: <t>¿Tom ay mach olto ach naancotoc ayic toxo ix chami? Malaj junoc mach ol b'itan d'ayach d'a scal eb' yetchamnaquil chi'.</t>
6: <t>Ste el vip voq'ui. Man̈ jantacoc voc' d'a junjun ac'val. Sch'ayxiel in c'an̈ jolom yuj yal in sat.</t>
7: <t>Maxtzac yal-laj vilani, yujto ix mal in sat voq'ui yujn̈ej eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin.</t>
8: <t>Elan̈ec d'a in tz'ey a ex to an̈ej chucal tze c'ulej. Toxo ix yab' Jehová in sic'sic'an voq'ui.</t>
9: <t>Toxo ix yab' in tevi d'ay. Toxo ix scha in lesal.</t>
10: <t>A eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin, ol can eb' d'a q'uixvelal. Ton̈ej ol somchajcanel eb'. D'a junn̈ej mutz'satil ol can eb' d'a q'uixvelc'olal.</t>
